headline.print_headline: Reverse Mortgage Lenders Fined for Ads That ‘Tricked’ Older Borrowers
headline.main: Reverse Mortgage Lenders Fined for Ads That ‘Tricked’ Older Borrowers

snippet: The companies promoted the loans as essentially risk-free, federal regulators said. But borrowers can lose their homes through foreclosure if they fail to make necessary payments....
lead_paragraph: The companies promoted the loans as essentially risk-free, federal regulators said. But borrowers can lose their homes through foreclosure if they fail to make necessary payments.
